exits.Shadow Temple Beginning:
(logic_lens_shadow or can_use(Lens_of_Truth)) and
                (can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot) or (can_mega and is_adult) or
                (can_mega and Child_Shadow))

locations.Shadow Temple Hover Boots Chest:
has_soul(Dead_hand)
                and (is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or (Sticks and logic_child_deadhand) or can_use(Megaton_Hammer))

exits.Shadow Temple First Beamos:
can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega or
                (adv_shadow_double_boosts and can_damage_boost and can_live_dmg(1.0,False))

exits.Shadow Temple Huge Pit:
has_explosives and
                (((Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 1) and not (shadow_temple_shortcuts or
        (glitch_clipping and (is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks)))) or
                    (Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 5) or
                    ((Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 4) and (logic_lens_shadow_platform or can_use(Lens_of_Truth))))
exits.Shadow Temple Guillotine Hallway:
has_explosives and
                (((Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 1) and not (shadow_temple_shortcuts or
        (glitch_clipping and (is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks)))) or
                    (Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 5) or
                    ((Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 4) and Longshot and (logic_lens_shadow_platform or can_use(Lens_of_Truth))))
exits.Shadow Temple Boat Dock:
shadow_temple_shortcuts or
        (glitch_clipping and (is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks))
exits.Shadow Temple Boat Area Balcony:
glitch_shadow_boat_skull and glitch_clipping and (
                    (Child_Shadow and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False) and has_bombchus) or
                    (is_adult and can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False) and has_bombchus) or
                    (is_adult and glitch_shadow_boat_skull_adult_nothing and can_shield and glitch_clipping)
                )

locations.Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible C:
(can_kill_like_like and can_kill_keese_stationary)
                or can_weirdshot or (has_soul(Like_Like) and glitch_clipping and can_use(Hookshot))
locations.Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible:
(can_kill_like_like and can_kill_keese_stationary)
                or can_weirdshot or (has_soul(Like_Like) and glitch_clipping and can_use(Hookshot))
locations.Shadow Temple GS Invisible Blades Room:
can_weirdshot or (
                can_kill_like_like and can_kill_keese_stationary
                and (is_adult or can_hover or can_use(Boomerang))
                )
                or (has_soul(Like_Like) and glitch_clipping and can_use(Hookshot))

exits.Shadow Temple Falling Spikes:
(Silver_Rupee_Shadow_Temple_Huge_Pit, 5)
                or (glitch_shadow_gate_falling_spikes and (is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks))

locations.Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest:
(logic_shadow_umbrella and
                    (can_use(Hover_Boots)
                        or (can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False) and adv_damage_boost)
                        or glitch_clipping
                    )
                )
                or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade
locations.Shadow Temple GS Falling Spikes Room:
logic_shadow_umbrella_gs or can_use(Hookshot) or
                can_use(Boomerang) or (is_adult and can_groundjump) or (is_child and can_hover)

exits.Shadow Temple Wind Tunnel:
((is_adult and (Hover_Boots or can_isg) and can_groundjump)
                or
                ((can_kill_redead and can_use(Hookshot)) or can_use(Longshot))
                or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_use(Hookshot) and (can_use(Lens_of_Truth) or logic_lens_shadow))
                )
                and (Small_Key_Shadow_Temple, 3)

region_name: Shadow Temple Single Giant Pot Room

locations.Shadow Temple Freestanding Key:
Bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or
                (logic_shadow_freestanding_key and has_bombchus)

exits.Shadow Temple Boat Area Balcony:
glitch_shadow_boat_skull and
                ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_mega or can_superslide)) or can_hover)

locations.Shadow Temple GS Near Ship:
at('Shadow Temple Aboard Boat',can_use(Longshot)) or
                (is_adult and can_groundjump) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang) or
                (Child_Shadow and can_hover and has_bombchus)

exits.Shadow Temple 3 Spinning Pots Rupees: Bombs or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or (logic_shadow_triple_pots and has_bombchus)
exits.Shadow Temple Before Boss:
Bow or (logic_shadow_statue and has_bombchus) or shadow_temple_shortcuts
                or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_mega or can_superslide or (adv_hovers_recoil and can_live_dmg(0.5,False))))

region_name: Shadow Temple Beyond Boat SoT Block

savewarp: Graveyard Warp Pad Region -> Shadow Temple Entryway

locations.Shadow Temple After Boat Upper Recovery:
at('Shadow Temple Beyond Boat Scarecrow',True)
                or at('Shadow Temple Beyond Boat SoT Block', can_use(Boomerang))

at('Shadow Temple Beyond Boat Scarecrow',True)
                or at('Shadow Temple Beyond Boat SoT Block', can_use(Boomerang))
locations.Shadow Temple After Boat Lower Recovery:
can_use(Boomerang)
                or at('Shadow Temple Beyond Boat SoT Block', True)
